.box-didatico {
  background: #f8f9fa;

.highlight-row {
  background-color: #fff3cd !important;

<script>
function highlightRow(tableId, value) {
  var table = $('#' + tableId).DataTable();
  table.rows().every(function () {
    var data = this.data();
    if (data[0] == value) {
      $(this.node()).addClass('highlight-row');
    } else {
      $(this.node()).removeClass('highlight-row');
    }
  });
}
</script>

### ğŸ“• DistribuiÃ§Ã£o F (consulta)

```{r}
gl_num <- 1:5
gl_den <- 1:10

tabela_f <- data.frame(GL_Den = gl_den)

for (gln in gl_num) {
  tabela_f[[paste0("GL_Num_", gln)]] <- round(qf(0.95, gln, gl_den), 2)
}

datatable(
  tabela_f,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 5,
    scrollX = TRUE
  ),
  rownames = FALSE
)
```
